Sheilds are up.

::Magmatron::

    The external defense system came online=
, and shot at the transformer. It was only a stun. Then Magmatron sent a co=
mm to the bot, it was his policy, you get a warning shot, then a comm, and =
if you fail to answer or show hostilities then you die.
    "What do you th=
ink your doing?!" Magmatron boomed. "Cease and desist, or be destroyed."
  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: NBW 
  Sent: W=
ednesday, January 31, 2001 11:37 PM
  Subject: Destron's have a visitor...
=


  Like-Like had been traveling in no direction is particular for a long t=
ime, and had wandered across land and sea until he made it to Northern Main=
e. He moved right up to the Destron base. He stopped, he knew there was som=
ething obstructing his path, and he didn't want to go around it. Like-Like =
rammed into the base, and:

  1: (If the shields are down) He rammed into i=
t again and again, howling.

  2: (If the shields are up) He slammed into i=
t, was shocked and burnt by the shields, and then repeated this again and a=
gain, creating a black mark on his flabby slimy skin...

        Yahoo! Gro=
ups Sponsor
